entry.title: Derby Originals 600D Shimmering Star Ripstop Waterproof Nylon Medium Weight Mini Horse and Pony Turnout Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Blankets
Price: 34.95

Our 600D Shimmering Star Ripstop Waterproof Nylon Medium Weight Mini Horse and Pony Turnout Blankets were designed to offer an adorable, colorful, yet still hardy blanket option for the little equine in your life! These blankets are a mix of fun pink and purple stars on a pink background with purple accenting and a pink and purple striped trim. This blanket has all your favorite turnout blanket features: front chest buckles, a shoulder gusset, a fleece wither protector, crossed belly straps, removable elastic leg straps, and a tail cover.


Waterproof Construction: this blanket is made from a waterproof nylon material covered in a  Teflon coating. These blankets are guaranteed to be fully waterproof unless the blanket is ripped/torn, or the Teflon coating is damaged through improper washing or cleaning, or abuse of the blanket.

  • THE PERFECT WINTER BLANKET - this blanket is the perfect winter blanket for almost any horse and climate, due to it’s highly adjustable and classic features, hefty 250g of Polyfil, and sturdy ripstop nylon shell.
  • COMFORTABLE, ADJUSTABLE FIT - this blanket features a shoulder gusset for an advanced freedom of movement, a soft fleece wither protector, and a soft 210T nylon inner lining to prevent irritation on the hair coat.
  • DESIGNED TO FIT MINIS AND PONIES - this blanket was designed to best fit the bodies of miniature horses and pony breeds, who often differ in conformation when compared to horses.
  • RIPSTOP NYLON OUTER SHELL - this blanket features a 600D ripstop nylon construction that is extremely tear and cut resistant, meaning that you can leave your horse in the barn or at pasture without worry of a blanket tear.
  • ONE YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER’S WARRANTY - this blanket comes with a one year manufacturer’s warranty through Derby Originals, which protects against manufacturing and quality defects.

Sizing Information

This turnout blanket is sized in the same manner that you will size any other horse blanket: by measuring, in inches, from the center of your horse’s chest to the end of your horse’s rump. If your horse is in-between sizes, we recommend sizing up to the closest available size.

 

Product Information

Blanket Style: Turnout Blanket

Waterproof: Yes

Breathable: Yes

Weight: Medium Weight

Material: Nylon

Denier: 600

Ripstop: Yes

Tail Cover: Yes

Wither Protector: Yes

Shoulder Gussets: Yes

Polyfill: 250g

Inner Lining: 210T Nylon

Belly Closure: Crossed Surcingles

Leg Straps: Crossed Elastic

Colors Available: Shimmering Star

Sizes Available: 36”, 40”, 44”, 48”, 54”, 58”, 60”, 62”, 64”, and 66”

entry.title: Derby Originals Reflective Safety No Hardware Foal & Mini Horse Winter Turnout Blanket 1200D Medium Weight 150g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Blankets
Price: 49.99 - 59.99 (9 variants)

Derby Originals Reflective Safety Winter Blanket for Foals are a better and more modern solution to outdated foal blanket designs. Our foal blanket features a pair of adjustable double-velcro chest straps that allow for the blanket to be adjusted to fit smaller or larger foals. These chest straps are elastic to allow for a more comfortable and snug fit, which helps keep your foal safe and from becoming tangled. This blanket also features matching elastic double-velcro belly straps for the best possible fit. All four chest and belly straps are covered in reflective tape to greatly increase visibility and help keep your foal safe outside or in the pasture. We're proud to be the original inventor of the hardware free foal blanket, which has no metal parts to increase your foal's comfort and safety. Our innovative blanket also has a pair of adjust-to-fit neck-straps to allow for a better fit around the neck opening. Our blankets come with an oversized tail cover that is held in place with 3 sturdy velcro tabs and can be removed and replaced as needed. Our blankets are made of 1200D, ripstop, waterproof, windproof, and snowproof nylon, which is durable and designed for indoor and outdoor use. This blanket has 150 grams of PolyFil filling, which is designed to keep your foal warm without overheating in temperatures down to 10° F. Our blankets have been designed with care to last and keep your foals comfortable and are backed by a two-year limited warranty.


DESIGNED TO GROW WITH YOUR FOAL - our safety blankets have adjustable straps and elastic on the chest and belly straps to allow for the best fit possible. Our blankets can adjust by 6" so they fit your foal for longer and can fit multiple foals.

NO HARDWARE DESIGN KEEPS YOUR FOAL SAFE - this blanket is metal-free for increased safety. This, combined with other features such as a reflective design, adjustable neck straps, and a padded belly band, increases both your foal's safety and comfort.

AVAILABLE IN THREE SIZES - our foal blankets are available in three sizes to fit most Small, Medium, and Large foals. Size Small is recommended for most newborn foals. Sizes Medium and Large will also fit most mini horses as well as larger foals.

SIZING RECOMMENDATIONS FOR MINIS - Please note that the back length and belly straps are shorter as these blankets are meant to fit foals. We do not recommend the size Small for any mini horse, only sizes Medium and Large, and recommend sizing up.

2 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 2-year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Accidents and normal wear and tear are not covered. To register your product, visit Derby Originals' website.

entry.title: Derby Originals Reflective Safety No Hardware Foal & Mini Horse Winter Stable Blanket 420D Medium Weight 150g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stable Blankets
Price: 37.99 - 42.99 (6 variants)

Derby Originals Reflective Safety Winter Blanket for Foals are a better and more modern solution to outdated foal blanket designs. Our foal blankets feature a pair of adjustable double-velcro chest straps that allow for the blanket to be adjusted to fit smaller or larger foals. These chest straps are elastic to allow for a more comfortable and snug fit, which helps keep your foal safe and from becoming tangled. This blanket also features matching elastic double-velcro belly straps for the best possible fit. All four chest and belly straps are covered in reflective tape to greatly increase visibility and help keep your foal safe outside or in the pasture. We're proud to be the original inventor of the hardware free foal blanket, which has no metal parts to increase your foal's comfort and safety. Our innovative blanket also has a pair of adjust-to-fit neck-straps to allow for a better fit around the neck opening. Our blankets come with an oversized tail cover that is held in place with 3 sturdy velcro tabs and can be removed and replaced as needed. Our blankets are made of 420D water-resistant, windproof, breathable nylon, which is designed for premium comfort indoors. This blanket has 150 grams of PolyFil filling, which is designed to keep your foal warm without overheating in temperatures down to 10° F. This blanket is available in three fun colors so you can find the perfect blanket to best suit your new foal: Coral, Charcoal, and Hurricane Blue.


  • DESIGNED TO GROW WITH YOUR FOAL - our safety blankets have adjustable straps and elastic on the chest and belly straps to allow for the best fit possible. Our blankets can adjust by 6" so they fit your foal for longer and can fit multiple foals.
  • NO HARDWARE DESIGN KEEPS YOUR FOAL SAFE - this blanket is metal-free for increased safety. This, combined with other features such as a reflective design, adjustable neck straps, and a padded belly band, increases both your foal's safety and comfort.
  • AVAILABLE IN THREE SIZES - our foal blankets are available in three sizes to fit most Small, Medium, and Large foals. Size Small is recommended for most newborn foals. Sizes Medium and Large will also fit most mini horses as well as larger foals.
  • SIZING RECOMMENDATIONS FOR MINIS - Please note that the back length and belly straps are shorter as these blankets are meant to fit foals. We do not recommend the size Small for any mini horse, only sizes Medium and Large, and recommend sizing up.
  • DESIGNED FOR INDOOR USE - our foal blankets are made from a 420D material that is designed to keep your foal comfortable indoors by being breathable and comfortable to wear. This allows your foal to stay warm without becoming overheated.

entry.title: Derby Originals Nordic Tough Closed Front 420D Water Resistant Reflective Winter Horse Stable Blanket 200g Medium Weight
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stable Blankets
Price: 79.99 - 94.99 (22 variants)

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium horse blanket by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This sturdy blanket is made of durable and high-quality materials.
  • INNOVATIVE, MODERN BLANKET DESIGN - our new Nordic-Tough reflective blanket series boasts new premium features such as padded belly bands, adjust-to-fit neck straps, a safety reflective bodied design, contoured fit, and more.
  • DESIGNED FOR MAXIMUM INDOOR COMFORT - this premium stable blanket was designed to be warm, draft and wind-resistant, breathable, water-resistant, and comfortable to wear no matter how long your horse is blanketed indoors.
  • WARMING TRIPLE LAYER DESIGN - this blanket features a soft but strong 210T inner lining, 200g of polyfil insulation that provides extra warmth without overheating, and a soft 420D nylon exterior that is breathable and water-resistant.
  • SAFETY CLOSED-FRONT DESIGN - this blanket was designed with a closed chest that has no hardware in order to protect your horse and prevent injury. This, combined with our padded belly band closure, promotes both comfort and safety.

entry.title: Derby Originals Jungle Blues 600D Horse Winter Turnout Blanket - Warehouse Find
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Blankets
Price: 69.99

This 600D waterproof blanket comes in a fun attractive "Jungle Blues" design and will make your horse stand out from the others! Seamless spine keeps your horse nice and dry.

In order to ensure that your horse is as comfortable as can be, stable blankets are not waterproof, whereas turnout blankets are. To clarify, waterproofing reduces the breathing capability of the blankets, meaning the horse would be more comfortable with a stable blanket in their stall. Turnout blankets are waterproof because the horse gains the breathability through movement and play time outdoors.

entry.title: Derby Originals Nordic-Tough 1200D Medium Weight Winter Horse Neck Cover Hood 150g with 2 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Blanket Hoods
Price: 39.99

RIPSTOP NYLON OUTER SHELL - this blanket hood features a 1200D ripstop nylon construction that is extremely tear and cut-resistant, meaning that you can leave your horse in the barn or at pasture without worry.

THE PERFECT BLANKET HOOD - this blanket is the perfect winter blanket hood for almost any horse and climate, due to its highly adjustable design, hefty 150g of Polyfil, and sturdy ripstop nylon shell.

COMFORTABLE FIT - this blanket hood has a soft 210T nylon inner lining to prevent irritation of the hair coat or mane, and a cozy 150g of Polyfil to keep your horse warm in the worst weather.

QUICK ATTACH SNAPS - this hood attaches to your blanket via three adjustable heavy-duty swiveling snaps, which allows you to adjust the placement of your hood for the best fit possible, and put it on/off with ease.

2 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 2 year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Normal wear and tear and accidents are not covered. To register your product warranty, visit Derby Originals' website.

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

entry.title: Waterproof 420D Draft Sheets with 210T Lining Closeout
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Turnout Sheets
Price: 31.95

Don't let your big guys get cold or wet! This sheet is water proof and designed to keep your gentle giant happy and dry.
  • 420D nylon outer shell with 210T lining waterproof, breathable sheet
  • Fleece wither protector
  • Double buckle front closure for that extra strength
  • Leg straps, two inch wide belly strap and attached tail cover
  • Stainless steel hardware
  • **Discontinued design
  • Very hard to find 100" size!

entry.title: Derby Originals Extreme Elements Series 1200D Ripstop Waterproof Nylon Heavy Weight Horse Turnout Blanket Hood with 2 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Neck Covers
Price: 19.95

Our Extreme Elements Series 1200D Ripstop Waterproof Nylon Heavyweight Horse Turnout Blanket Hood was designed to be a comfortable, attractive, and durable hood option to fit almost any horse and blanket. This hood attaches using three adjustable quick attach snaps and is sure to help keep your horse warm and clean in even the worst winter weather.


Waterproof Construction: this blanket hood is made from a waterproof nylon material covered in a  Teflon coating. These blanket hoods are guaranteed to be fully waterproof unless the hood is ripped/torn, or the Teflon coating is damaged through improper washing or cleaning, or abuse of the blanket hood.


  • THE PERFECT BLANKET HOOD - this blanket is the perfect winter blanket hood for almost any horse and climate, due to its highly adjustable design, hefty 200g of Polyfil, and sturdy ripstop nylon shell.
  • RIPSTOP NYLON OUTER SHELL - this blanket hood features a 1200D ripstop nylon construction that is extremely tear and cut resistant, meaning that you can leave your horse in the barn or at pasture without worry of a blanket tear.
  • KEEP YOUR HORSE WARM IN ANY WEATHER - this blanket hood was designed to keep your horse warm even in below zero weather thanks to its heavyweight 150g of Polyfil.
  • QUICK ATTACH SNAPS - this hood attaches to your blanket via three adjustable heavy-duty swiveling snaps, which allows you to adjust the placement of your hood for the best fit possible, and put it on/off with ease.
  • TWO YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER’S WARRANTY - this blanket hood comes with a two-year manufacturer’s warranty through Derby Originals, which protects against manufacturing and quality defects.

entry.title: Derby Originals Nordic-Tough 1200D Heavy Weight Reflective Waterproof Winter Horse Turnout Blanket 300g with 2 Year Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Blankets
Price: 109.99 - 119.99 (29 variants)

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium horse blanket by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This sturdy blanket is made from durable and high quality materials.

INNOVATIVE, MODERN BLANKET DESIGN - our Nordic-Tough reflective blanket series is new for 2019 and boasts new features such as quick-clip double chest buckles, adjust-to-fit neck straps, a safety reflective bodied design, contoured fit, and more.

DESIGNED FOR BOTH INDOOR AND OUTDOOR USE - this sturdy turnout blanket was designed to be comfortable to wear both indoors and out. Our durable ripstop design means this blanket is great for use out in the pasture and group turnout.

DURABLE TRIPLE LAYER DESIGN - this blanket features a soft but strong 210T inner lining, 300g of polyfil insulation that provides extra warmth without overheating, and a sturdy 1200D nylon exterior that is ripstop, breathable, and waterproof.

2 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 2 year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Normal wear and tear and accidents are not covered. To register your product warranty, visit Derby Originals' website.

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HORSE'S COMFORT IN MIND - this premium horse blanket by Derby Originals was meticulously designed here in the USA to be comfortable for your horse to wear. This sturdy blanket is made from durable and high quality materials.

INNOVATIVE, MODERN BLANKET DESIGN - our Nordic-Tough reflective blanket series is new for 2019 and boasts new features such as quick-clip double chest buckles, adjust-to-fit neck straps, a safety reflective bodied design, contoured fit, and more.

1 YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - this product is eligible for a 1 year warranty that protects against manufacturing defects. Normal wear and tear and accidents are not covered. To register your product warranty, visit Derby Originals' website.

 

Care Instructions

 

Dried mud, hair, hay, and other debris should be regularly brushed off your blanket. A stiff dandy brush often works best for this. Keeping your blanket clean helps extend its lifespan, as well as help to keep your horse clean and happy. You can also use a damp, soapy rag to remove mud/debris and then wipe your blanket dry. Fleece blankets should only be hand washed and never machine washed. All removable parts should be removed before washing, all velcro straps velcroed together, and your blanket should only be washed in a detergent made for use with horse blankets, or gentle animal-safe cleaners. When washing, use cool water and hand wash gently. Do not use fabric softener with any of our blankets as it will damage their waterproofing and breathing abilities and prevent the blanket from wicking water and sweat off your horse. All of our blankets should be air-dried or line-dried, never put in a dryer. If your blanket becomes nicked or torn, the blanket should immediately be sewn or patched to prevent further damage from occurring.
